body_html: Hi @Cadene, I also meet the same problem. When I save the state_dict of Adam optim, it is empty in the 'state' entry; so when I retrain the model, it always throws a keyerror. I'm wondering is this a bug in pytorch itself?
body_text: Hi @Cadene, I also meet the same problem. When I save the state_dict of Adam optim, it is empty in the 'state' entry; so when I retrain the model, it always throws a keyerror. I'm wondering is this a bug in pytorch itself?
body: Hi @Cadene, I also meet the same problem. When I save the state_dict of Adam optim, it is empty in the 'state' entry; so when I retrain the model, it always throws a keyerror. I'm wondering is this a bug in pytorch itself?
